name: IceMan (tmkaplan94)
description: Ice Man is 2D 8-bit style adventure game, where the player controls an Ice Man, digging to collect gold and oil. He must avoid NPC protestors that roam the field and can target Ice Man if he gets close enough. As the levels increase, so does the difficulty, as more protestors spawn and with better targeting. Ice Man can collect powerups to help him in his endeavors, such as water blasts to stun protestors and sonar to help locate goodies hidden in the ice. Watch out for falling boulders!
